refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sets the global seed value for all x-class noise generators, as well as other opcodes that use a random call, such as grain.

note.title: Please Note
note.para: rand, randh, randi, rnd(x) and birnd(x) are not affected by seed.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Use of seed will provide predictable results from an orchestra using with random generators, when required from multiple performances.
When specifying a seed value, ival should be an integer between 0 and 232. If ival = 0, the value of ival will be derived from the system clock.

refsect1.para:
